elaris-veyra-burning-spirit-ritual-aspec.name: Elaris Veyra, Burning Spirit

speed.notes: Floats above the ground amid fog and fire.

elaris-veyra-burning-spirit-ritual-aspec.traits:
**Ritual-Bound**: Elaris cannot be reduced to 0 hit points or killed in this form. She is redeemed or transformed only through ritual progress.

**Flame Aura**: Creatures that start their turn within 5 ft. of Elaris take 1d6 fire damage.

**Escalation Thresholds**: At ritual progress 4+, she gains Flaming Memory. At 8+, she uses Desperate Claws each round. At 12+, she is redeemed and vanishes.

**Legendary Resistance (1/Day)**: If Elaris would be stunned (e.g., by the Bell), she can choose to succeed instead.
elaris-veyra-burning-spirit-ritual-aspec.actions:
**Flaming Memory**: 60-ft range; spectral fire lashes out. Available once ritual progress reaches 4+.

**Desperate Claws**: Available once ritual progress reaches 8+.

meta.source: Die flüsternden Gräber – Final Ritual section
meta.notes: Ritual flow, aura, thresholds, and bell interaction per adventure.

elaris-veyra.name: Elaris Veyra
elaris-veyra.traits:
**Detect Life**: The banshee magically senses the direction of creatures up to 1 mile away that aren't Constructs or Undead.

**Incorporeal Movement**: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain|XPHB. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
elaris-veyra.actions:
**Multiattack**: The banshee makes two Corrupting Touch attacks and uses Horrify.

**Corrupting Touch**: m 5, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic damage.

**Horrify**: wis 13, one creature the banshee can see within 60 feet that can see the banshee. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the banshee's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this banshee's Horrify for 24 hours.

**Deathly Wail (1/Day)**: The banshee releases a mournful wail if it isn't in sunlight. con 13, each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wail and isn't a Construct or an Undead. {@actSaveFail} If the target has 25 Hit Points|XPHB or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB. Otherwise, the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.
